actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide for a temporary period of time for the duty-free entry of the personal and household effects of members of the Armed Forces who were in missing status during the Vietnam Conflict.

summary.text: Permits the duty-free entry for a temporary period of time of the personal and household effects of members of the Armed Forces who were in missing status during the Vietnam conflict.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a temporary period of time for the duty-free entry of the personal and household effects of members of the Armed Forces who were in missing status during the Vietnam Conflict.
